name: "My Folk" 2d platformer
description:
The game was developed in a team of 5 members, including game, level designers, artists, and developers. 

Amazing artwork, 4 types of attack, partly-generated levels, different enemies... check it out!

Development started on 02.2021, took about 3-4 months for the current version.

Currently, only the demo version is available.

Animations should be fixed and new levels should be added.

For updates and other projects
https://t.me/digit29
